Okay guys I know we’re all upset that dnp aren’t posting a halloween baking video this year BUT one of my friends Emily did!! I think it’s a good video and I wanna show her my support so go check it out!

blog.name: thephancast
blog.title: The PhanCast
blog.description: a monthly fan-run podcast for all things Dan and Phil

summary: The PhanCast - Episode 4: Collabs
title: The PhanCast - Episode 4: Collabs
body:
Length: 01:38:17

Listen on SoundCloud | Listen on iTunes | Listen on Stitcher | RSS 

Hosts:

Jane: @agingphangirl | Twitter | Ao3

Julia: @ineverhadmyinternetphase | Twitter | Ao3

Charlotte: @charlottekath | Twitter

Send us art | Send us an ask | Send us an email

In this episode we are all sleep deprived in our den talking about collaborating, Dan & Phil, and as usual many things off topic.

Show Notes under the cut

Questions from listeners

We answered some questions in our minisode, click here to listen to that one first

“Hey guys! I love that phancast! I love to re-listen to your videos while I’m at work to get through the day. I was wondering if you guys had any ideas or thoughts on what DnP will do in the future (youtube related). After watching dans live show about how he isn’t really concerned with videos and how he views himself as a creator and not a “youtuber” and what this means for them. I feel phil will go back to his usual but I am unsure what is going on haha there isn’t much “content” besides gaming”

As we answered something similar in the minisode, we talk about projects we’d like to see from D&P including a podcast, some other projects, and a tell-all book

“I can’t remember who said it but I bet you are so happy that II is on dvd!! I am excited for it to be a physical copy too!”

Jane was very happy about a DVD and has ordered too many copies.

Quick logistics question from us to you: If we uploaded these podcasts to YouTube, would that be something you’d be interested in? Is that a better way for you to listen or do the current hosting platforms work?

Previously on Dan and Phil

Things we talked about: 

  • Dan’s merch for Young Minds
  • The Mukbang
  • The Driving Video
  • Spooky Week

We also got off-topic and discuss:

  • PJ’s Space Trip Tour
  • Driving lessons in the UK
  • Recent Live Shows
  • Fantastic Adventures - Dean & Bertie’s podcast
  • Kaleidotrope - The best queer rom com podcast ever!
  • and much much more

Monthly Topic: Collabs

Things we talked about:

  • Why we don’t think Dan and Phil appearing together is considered a ‘collab’ anymore
  • What makes a good collab? What are our favourites?
  • What are some collabs that don’t work in our opinion?
  • What makes a good spon/bad spon and our favourites?
  • What collabs would we like to see?
  • Our (and your) favourite fan-run collaborative projects

Links to things we mentioned:

Here is a link to a playlist with some of the collab videos we mentioned

@phandomficfests (word war chats are posted here too)

InDepthBants forum

@phandomgives @fandomtrumpshate

Phandom get out the vote giveaway

Updatedphan, phanoutfits, meetingphan

@phandombigbang  @phandomreversebang 

Honorary mention to @waveydnp @psychicmoth and @alittledizzy for making the printed version of A Match and a Fuse available to purchase.

To correct an error in this episode: The bead art Dan made is a pokemon (Jane is just old and didn’t recognise it) it’s a Rapidash, and in the sculpting video with Charlie they do make a unicorn!


Fanfiction

Julia: Warm fuzzies

Bacon and Aches - @thespianhowell

The pull (to you) -  basicallymonsters

Don’t trust a song that’s flawless - @leblonde

Charlotte: Dan and Phil and ….babies?

Ellen - @watergator 

Flaws of Biology - @scifiphan

you give me life - @manialester

Jane: Stuff I had to take off my faves list because we were only allowed 3

litany in which certain things are crossed out by nokomisfics, recklessfishes

Bare by basicallymonsters

Beside You I’m a Loaded Gun by ramonaspeaks


Also we mentioned A Waiting Game by @alittledizzy again because we can’t help ourselves.


Final section

We get off topic and perhaps invent a new segment of the podcast talking about Tom and Lance and their new baby!

What are we looking forward to? 

  • Spoooooky week
  • II  DVD release (but we’ll probably record before that)
  • AmazingPhil spooky week finale video

What is next month’s theme?

  • Fandom and traditions

See you next time!

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: it’s kinda weird that everyone‘s saying "ooo he bought the flowers for phil stop lying“ like dan said they’re for himself why...
question: it’s kinda weird that everyone‘s saying "ooo he bought the flowers for phil stop lying“ like dan said they’re for himself why can’t he just buy flowers
answer: Right? Can’t a man buy himself some flowers? Damn, leave the dude alone.

reblog.comment: Right? Can’t a man buy himself some flowers? Damn, leave the dude alone.

trail.content_raw: Right? Can’t a man buy himself some flowers? Damn, leave the dude alone.

blog.description: 17•they/them pronouns• dan and Phil blog•follow me if you like what I post/reblog! No pressure and I love you all•

summary: at this point i think a majority of the fandom has never been in a long term relationship (platonic or romantic) because if you...
question: at this point i think a majority of the fandom has never been in a long term relationship (platonic or romantic) because if you have then you’d know how NORMAL dnp’s relationship (whichever it is) really is
answer: I feel like a lot of the Phandom is still in their early to mid teens so probably haven’t had any serious relationships yet. I just hope that they don’t go into their first serious relationship thinking that real life is going to be the same as fanfiction. Because it’s not. It never is. And a lot of the phandom seems to have very unrealistic and flat unhealthy ideas of what #relationshipgoals is supposed to look like.

summary: Don't get me wrong, I'm so so so happy that Dan's decided to be open on the internet about struggling with depression. I think...
question: Don't get me wrong, I'm so so so happy that Dan's decided to be open on the internet about struggling with depression. I think he's helped so many people, and probably himself too by not hiding that part of his life anymore. However, I do find it regrettable that for some people, knowing about his depression seems to have strengthened the idea of "omg Phil has to be there for Dan ALWAYS, Dan can NEVER be left alone." Depression doesn't equal helplessness, kids. He'll be alright.
answer:
I’ve noticed that too. Ever since Dan made that video, people are quick to assume that depression is the reason for everything he does. They act like he’s in some kind of constant danger, like he can’t be left alone, or that if he doesn’t tweet for a day it’s because he’s having an episode, or whatever else.


I understand that having depression is a constant battle, but like, come on y’all. Dan is a rich privileged white boy. He’s in an excellent position to have access to everything he needs to manage his mental health. He’s gonna be fine.

I understand that having depression is a constant battle, but like, come on y’all. Dan is a rich privileged white boy. He’s in an excellent position to have access to everything he needs to manage his mental health. He’s gonna be fine.

blog.name: luminoushowell
blog.title: Demons Only
blog.description:
Freckles are stars on your skin

Bri~She/Her~19~Hetero but demon AF

summary:
A few things about this clip:
1) Dan gets scared and literally reaches for Phil’s hand. I said this before and I’ll say it...
body:
A few things about this clip:

1) Dan gets scared and literally reaches for Phil’s hand. I said this before and I’ll say it again. I love that Phil said he gets protective of things cause I can see it so well now. Dan literally grabs Phil’s hand cause he’s scared and Phil makes him feel safe and I’m so soft

2) Look at how shy and bashful Dan looks when he realizes everyone is going to see him pry for Phil’s hand while he was scared, he just leans back in the chair and giggles all embarrassed and blushing, he’s too cute!

3) Look at how fond Phil is! Phil just looks back at Dan and chuckled at him in affection and teases how Dan’s scared and loud screams are scarier than the actual game and when Dan says he pulled Phil’s hand off the mouse, Look at Phil’s smile he’s just asking why he did that cause of the camera, he knows why Dan did it, and Phil is so endeared by this boy

This clip is so precious

summary: Phil when Dan’s not home: I went to an art gallery!! It was really cool! Fun times :) Dan when Phil’s not home: The world is...
body:
Phil when Dan’s not home: I went to an art gallery!! It was really cool! Fun times :)

Dan when Phil’s not home: The world is bleak and I am so so alone. Not even flowers can cheer me up because it’s just another reminder of how alone I am.
